overview: What feels better than a relaxed soothing massage? A sensual erotic massage by a woman for a woman, especially when it's your first time! Get your oil out and watch four beautiful couples discover the sexy female body together for the first time!  Lacy Lennon is a very picky client who Jane Wilde, a new masseuse, doesn't seem able to satisfy. Lacy decides Jane needs a lesson on how to touch a woman. Eager to learn and please her client, Jane is on her way to a very happy ending!  Kyler Quinn is a bit uncomfortable, she has a new masseuse, Lily Glee. After getting oiled and rubbed, Lily caresses and touches her in ways the other one never did, exploring areas no girl as ever ventured before! Guess who has a new favorite masseuse!?
title: 1st Time Lesbian Massage
